Rivers are just like the tube network for migratory fish and their path is often blocked by locks or weirs. The Roadmap project focuses on mapping these to provide a blueprint for strategic steps to improve connectivity.

urls.title: Coronavirus monitoring in sewage research
urls.description: RIVMNational Institute for Public Health and the Environment is conducting research on the presence of the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 in sewage. The coronavirus enters the sewage system via human faeces. By examining the sewage, RIVM wants to map the spread of the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 at an early stage.
